name: Alkida Balliu
content: Alkida Balliu Skip to content Associate Professor at Gran Sasso Science Institute (GSSI), L’Aquila, Italy. In 2020–2021 I was a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Algorithms and Complexity group headed by Prof. Fabian Kuhn, at the University of Freiburg, Germany. In 2018–2019 I was a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Distributed Algorithms group headed by Prof. Jukka Suomela, at  Aalto University, Finland. I obtained my PhD in 2017 at Gran Sasso Science Institute (GSSI) under the supervision of Prof. Pierre Fraigniaud. I am interested in several aspects of theoretical computer science, and in particular in the theory of distributed computing.
